net.joala.condition
Interface BooleanCondition

All Superinterfaces:
Condition<Boolean>
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultBooleanCondition
public interface BooleanCondition
extends Condition<Boolean>

Specialized condition for boolean states (true/false). Offers convenience methods like assumeTrue().

Since:
2/27/12

withTimeoutFactor

@Nonnull
BooleanCondition withTimeoutFactor(@Nonnegative
                                           double factor)
Description copied from interface: Condition
Sets a factor to speed up or slow down tests. If < 1.0 the tests will speed up at least for failures while a number > 1.0 increases the time to wait for the condition by the given factor.

Specified by:
withTimeoutFactor in interface Condition<Boolean>
Parameters:
factor - factor by which to increase the timeout for this condition
Returns:
a self-reference.
